nodes.text: Star Wars: Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith: The Chosen One

Star Wars: Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith: The Chosen One is the first story arc of Marvel Comics' series Darth Vader: Dark Lord of the Sith. Written by Charles Soule with art by Giuseppe Camuncoli, the arc comprises six issues, and was in publication from June 7, 2017 to October 4, 2017.
